JobTitle: Head of US&C Marketing, Uber for Business
JobFullDesc: In Uber for Business, we’re simplifying the way businesses move. The Uber for Business marketing team tells compelling stories to our audience about the power of moving employees and guests with one central solution. Help us bring modern ground transportation management to businesses around the globe.About the RoleWe're looking for an experienced leader to drive growth across Enterprise customers in the US and Canada. You’ll be responsible for developing the regional strategy, driving all Field Marketing programs, establishing the right KPIs and showcasing Marketing’s contribution to the overall business. The right candidate has deep expertise in how to reach an Enterprise audience and what levers to use across the funnel from lead generation to pipeline acceleration to customer engagement. This role will be directly responsible for planning and execution, and will define the global framework, partnering with teams worldwide. The right candidate is proven to be a results-driven marketer, capable of building and developing teams.What You'll DoDevelop and lead the strategic marketing plan to drive demand and grow usage across Mid-Market and Enterprise customers while also playing a pivotal role in the global marketing strategy.Build lead generation and account-based-marketing programs to source new leads, support named account lists and engage customers after they're onboarded.Lead the events strategy for sponsored and hosted engagements and all higher touch activities including webinars.Influence the development of content including sales collateral and narratives.Partner closely with Sales to align on priorities, enable them to meet their business objectives and regularly review performance.Measure the impact of work by establishing the right metrics, developing reports and communicating results with leadership and cross-functional partners.Lead and develop a high performing team of B2B marketing professionals.Be a leader with vision on new ways to engage with large companies and establish Uber as a key transportation and logistics partner.Basic QualificationsMinimum 10 years of proven experience in a high-tech B2B marketing role owning regional or global growth targets.Preferred QualificationsProven experience working with sales teams to drive leads, accelerate pipeline and deliver revenue.Excellent verbal and written communication, and cross-functional skills to collaborate with Marketing, Sales and Product teams.Critical thinking including the ability to see and communicate the big picture in a way that inspires your team and partners.Ability to influence and bring others together to achieve goals.Highly analytical with a data-driven mentality and experience reporting results across the business.A passion for establishing teams, developing people, and producing results.
